items.title: Microsoft Pauses Some Construction on OpenAI Wisconsin Data Center
items.description: Microsoft said in May that it planned to invest $3.3 billion by the end of 2026 to build an AI data center campus in the area.

items.title: 'A $2M Bet On Recovery': Bill Gates Quietly Buys 2 Stocks He Believes Will Define 2025's Economic Boom
items.description: Bill Gates is turning heads again, but not for anything tech-related. While Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) remains his largest holding (about $15.4 billion) in the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation portfolio, Gates has been making some surprising moves. Over the past year, he sold nearly a quarter of his Microsoft stock, but his bold third-quarter buys have everyone talking. Gates put his money into two transportation companies, signaling he's betting big on an industry bounce-back. Don't Miss: It’s no w

items.title: 1 Vanguard ETF I'm Buying in 2025 and Holding Forever
items.description: The right investment has the power to transform your portfolio, and exchange-traded funds (ETFs) can be a smart way to supercharge your savings with very little effort.  An ETF is a group of securities bundled together into a single investment.  Each fund can contain dozens or hundreds of stocks, and by investing in just one share of an ETF, you'll instantly own a stake in all the companies within that fund.
